titles: The west country nymph or The loyal maid of Bristol. The flower of Bristol doth complain for the absence of her love and vows she constant will remain like to the turtle dove. Tune, Young Jammy.
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Broadsides --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
